tool_description: Monitor YouTube live chat using direct API calls with continuation tokens

available_commands.description: Send message to YouTube live chat (not implemented - YouTube restricts this)
Get recent chat messages for context (automatic - no manual calls needed)

tool_usage_examples: Monitor-only mode - YouTube does not allow bot message sending via API
Automatically fetches live chat using continuation tokens
Tracks conversation context (last 10 messages by default)
Responds based on viewer chat messages and comments
Reference stream content and viewer questions naturally
Use enthusiastic, engaging tone for YouTube audience
proactive_triggers: When viewers send messages in YouTube live chat
When viewers ask questions or make comments
When chat activity picks up during stream events
When viewers reference specific stream moments
When conversation naturally calls for engagement
React to Super Chats, memberships, and special events

metadata.notes: Monitor-only mode using YouTube's internal API with continuation tokens. Requires video ID of active live stream. Does NOT support sending messages (YouTube API restriction).
